CheckResults.queryText:
/*********
CONCEPT_RECORD_COMPLETENESS
number of 0s / total number of records 

Parameters used in this template:
cdmDatabaseSchema = cdm
cdmTableName = PERSON
cdmFieldName = gender_concept_id

**********/

SELECT num_violated_rows, CASE WHEN denominator.num_rows = 0 THEN 0 ELSE 1.0*num_violated_rows/denominator.num_rows END  AS pct_violated_rows, 
  denominator.num_rows as num_denominator_rows
FROM
(
	SELECT COUNT(violated_rows.violating_field) AS num_violated_rows
	FROM
	(
		SELECT 'PERSON.gender_concept_id' AS violating_field, cdmTable.* 
		FROM cdm.PERSON cdmTable
		
		WHERE cdmTable.gender_concept_id = 0 
	) violated_rows
) violated_row_count,
( 
	SELECT COUNT(*) AS num_rows
	FROM cdm.PERSON cdmTable
	
	
) denominator
;
CheckResults.checkDescription: The number and percent of records with a value of 0 in the standard concept field gender_concept_id in the PERSON table.

CheckResults.queryText:
/*********
CONCEPT_RECORD_COMPLETENESS
number of 0s / total number of records 

Parameters used in this template:
cdmDatabaseSchema = cdm
cdmTableName = CONDITION_OCCURRENCE
cdmFieldName = condition_concept_id

**********/

SELECT num_violated_rows, CASE WHEN denominator.num_rows = 0 THEN 0 ELSE 1.0*num_violated_rows/denominator.num_rows END  AS pct_violated_rows, 
  denominator.num_rows as num_denominator_rows
FROM
(
	SELECT COUNT(violated_rows.violating_field) AS num_violated_rows
	FROM
	(
		SELECT 'CONDITION_OCCURRENCE.condition_concept_id' AS violating_field, cdmTable.* 
		FROM cdm.CONDITION_OCCURRENCE cdmTable
		
		WHERE cdmTable.condition_concept_id = 0 
	) violated_rows
) violated_row_count,
( 
	SELECT COUNT(*) AS num_rows
	FROM cdm.CONDITION_OCCURRENCE cdmTable
	
	
) denominator
;
CheckResults.checkDescription: The number and percent of records with a value of 0 in the standard concept field condition_concept_id in the CONDITION_OCCURRENCE table.
CheckResults.notesValue:
There are 1324 condition_source_values that are mapped to zero. Of these, only 13 have a potential mapping but they only represent less than 50 total records. These records are mapped to zero because they are read codes that do not have any valid equivalents to standard concepts. Query used: select count(*), condition_source_value, condition_source_concept_id, c.concept_name, cr.relationship_id, cr.concept_id_2
from condition_occurrence co
join concept c 
  on co.condition_source_concept_id = c.concept_id
left join concept_relationship cr
  on co.condition_source_concept_id = cr.concept_id_1
where condition_concept_id = 0
group by condition_source_value, condition_source_concept_id, c.concept_name, cr.relationship_id, cr.concept_id_2
;

CheckResults.notesValue: There are 20% of records in the CPRD MEASUREMENT table where the unit_source_value is NULL and the value_as_number is not NULL. Threshold moved to 25% to account for units that cannot be mapped. This issue of mapping will be addressed in wrike task https://www.wrike.com/open.htm?id=527764013.

CheckResults.queryText:
/*********
CONCEPT_RECORD_COMPLETENESS
number of 0s / total number of records 

Parameters used in this template:
cdmDatabaseSchema = cdm
cdmTableName = VISIT_DETAIL
cdmFieldName = visit_detail_concept_id

**********/

SELECT num_violated_rows, CASE WHEN denominator.num_rows = 0 THEN 0 ELSE 1.0*num_violated_rows/denominator.num_rows END  AS pct_violated_rows, 
  denominator.num_rows as num_denominator_rows
FROM
(
	SELECT COUNT(violated_rows.violating_field) AS num_violated_rows
	FROM
	(
		SELECT 'VISIT_DETAIL.visit_detail_concept_id' AS violating_field, cdmTable.* 
		FROM cdm.VISIT_DETAIL cdmTable
		
		WHERE cdmTable.visit_detail_concept_id = 0 
	) violated_rows
) violated_row_count,
( 
	SELECT COUNT(*) AS num_rows
	FROM cdm.VISIT_DETAIL cdmTable
	
	
) denominator
;
CheckResults.checkDescription: The number and percent of records with a value of 0 in the standard concept field visit_detail_concept_id in the VISIT_DETAIL table.

CheckResults.queryText:
/*********
CONCEPT_RECORD_COMPLETENESS
number of 0s / total number of records *for the OBSERVATION.unit_concept_id and MEASUREMENT.unit_concept_id 
the numerator and denominator are limited to records where value_as_number IS NOT NULL

Parameters used in this template:
cdmDatabaseSchema = cdm
cdmTableName = OBSERVATION
cdmFieldName = observation_concept_id

**********/

SELECT num_violated_rows, CASE WHEN denominator.num_rows = 0 THEN 0 ELSE 1.0*num_violated_rows/denominator.num_rows END  AS pct_violated_rows, 
  denominator.num_rows as num_denominator_rows
FROM
(
	SELECT COUNT(violated_rows.violating_field) AS num_violated_rows
	FROM
	(
		SELECT 'OBSERVATION.observation_concept_id' AS violating_field, cdmTable.* 
		FROM cdm.OBSERVATION cdmTable
		
		WHERE cdmTable.observation_concept_id = 0 
	) violated_rows
) violated_row_count,
( 
	SELECT COUNT(*) AS num_rows
	FROM cdm.OBSERVATION cdmTable
	
	
) denominator
;
CheckResults.checkDescription: The number and percent of records with a value of 0 in the standard concept field observation_concept_id in the OBSERVATION table.
CheckResults.notesValue: The majority of records in CPRD OBSERVATION are coming from the additional table and do not have a valid standard mapping.

Metadata.sourceDescription: EMR data for over 9,000 patients from the United State. Contains both structured and unstructured data.
Metadata.sourceDocumentationReference: [For further information link to RWE site for Flatiron Multiple Myeloma.](https://catalog.rwe.jnj.com/index#jnjsearches?dataSetUri=%2Fdataset%2F7f67e26c-f0fa-4c51-817e-672a6f6ae4ea.xml)
